Location and contact information

Women's Health Center
Consolidation Building
Map of University Drive campus
Phone: 
412-360-6289 - Women's Health Coordinator
412-360-3753 - Maternity Care Coordinator
Hours: Monday – Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. ET

Make an appointment

If you have a primary care provider with VA Pittsburgh, you can call to make an appointment.

Phone:
412-360-3306 - mammogram
412-822-3000 - primary care

Schedule a primary care appointment online

Care we provide at VA Pittsburgh

Our women's health program offers women Veterans comprehensive care, including: 

  • Primary care
  • Gynecology
  • Maternity care, childbirth education classes, and postpartum support
  • Ultrasounds and mammograms
  • Mental health care and counseling
  • Lifestyle wellness services

Learn more and connect with a care coordinator

entity.name: Women Veteran care

description.processed: We offer women’s health services to meet your specific needs such as disease screenings, mental health treatment, recovery from military sexual trauma, maternity care and female-specific medical equipment.

entity.fieldCommonlyTreatedCondition: women's primary care, mental health, obstetrics and gynecology, pap smear, mammogram
